about_the_game:
Power up with a special themed collection of resources to help speed up your progress, unlock loot and more. Great for new and experienced Gems of War players alike.

  • This Bundle includes:
  • 505 Gems
  • 5005 Souls
  • 505 Glory
  • 5005 Gold
  • 5 Gold Keys
  • 5 Gem Keys
  • 5 Event Keys
  • 5 VIP Keys
detailed_description:
Power up with a special themed collection of resources to help speed up your progress, unlock loot and more. Great for new and experienced Gems of War players alike.

  • This Bundle includes:
  • 505 Gems
  • 5005 Souls
  • 505 Glory
  • 5005 Gold
  • 5 Gold Keys
  • 5 Gem Keys
  • 5 Event Keys
  • 5 VIP Keys
legal_notice: Published by 505 Games, Developed by Infinity Plus 2. 505 Games and the 505 Games logo are registered trademarks of 505 Games S.r.l. and its affiliates. 505 Mobile and the 505 Mobile logo are trademarks of 505 Mobile SRL or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
name: Gems of War - 505 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Vista SP1+, Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz or faster x86 CPU, or Intel Atom 1.6Hz or faster CPU (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD2000 series or better, GeForce 8 series or better, Intel 3000 or better (Pixel Shader 4 support required)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz or faster x86 CPU, or Intel Atom 1.6Hz or faster CPU (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5000 series or better, GeForce GTX400 series or better, Intel 3000 or better (Pixel Shader 4 support required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required

short_description: Power up with a special collection of resources and keys to help speed up your progress, unlock loot and more. Great for new and experienced Gems of War players alike.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
